use_cases.title: Create Task
use_cases.description: A user creates a new task with a title, description, and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to create tasks

main_flow.step: User enters task title and description
main_flow.description: User enters the title and description of the task
User selects the due date for the task
Task is created and added to the user's task list

use_cases.postconditions: Task is created and added to the user's task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to create new tasks efficiently

use_cases.title: Assign Task
use_cases.description: A user assigns a task to another user.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to assign tasks, Assignee is logged in and has permission to accept tasks

main_flow.description: User selects the task to assign
Task is assigned to the assignee

use_cases.postconditions: Task is assigned to the assignee
use_cases.business_value: Allows for efficient task assignment and delegation

use_cases.title: Track Task Progress
use_cases.description: A user views the progress of a task.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to view task progress

main_flow.step: User selects task to view progress
main_flow.description: User selects the task to view progress
Task progress is displayed, including due date, status, and comments

use_cases.business_value: Allows users to track task progress and stay informed

use_cases.title: Update Task
use_cases.description: A user updates the status of a task.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to update task status

main_flow.description: User selects the task to update
User updates the status of the task
Task status is updated and reflected in the task list

use_cases.business_value: Allows for efficient task status updates

use_cases.title: Delete Task
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to delete tasks

main_flow.description: User selects the task to delete
Task is deleted from the task list

business_requirements.overview: The Complete Test Task Management App will provide a user-friendly interface for creating, assigning, tracking, and updating tasks.
assumptions: Users will have basic computer skills
Users will have permission to create and update tasks
mitigation_strategies: Implement robust testing and quality assurance
